id.description: The unique identifier of the company location

name.description: The name of the company location

note.description: Additional notes about the company location

id.description: The unique identifier of the parent company

name.description: The name of the parent company

last_name.description: Last name on the shipping address

address2.description: Second line of the shipping address

currency.description: The currency associated with the company location

market.description: Market information for the company location

id.description: The unique identifier of the market

total_spent.description: Total amount spent by the company location
